de.eckhartarnold.client

Class Thumbnails

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.eckhartarnold.client.Thumbnails

  • public class Thumbnails
extends java.lang.Object
    Administers a collection of thumbnail images.

    The images are read upon instancing the class. Individual thumbnails can be picked from the collection with the method get; the number of thumbnails within the collection can be queried via size; finally, the sizes of all thumbnails can be adjusted with the method adjustSize. The index of each thumbnail is stored in the "id" field of the \-Tag and can be queried via the indexOf-method. The "id"-field of the thumbnail image should should be considered as being "owned" by the Thumbnail object and should not be overwritten.

    Author:
    ecki

    • Constructor Detail

      • Thumbnails

        public Thumbnails(ImageCollectionInfo collection)
        Reads the thumbnails from the given image collection. It is assumed that the smallest version of each image in the collection is its thumbnail.
        Parameters:
        collection - the image collection from which the thumbnails are to be collected

      • Thumbnails

        public Thumbnails(java.lang.String[] thumbnailURLs,
          int[][] thumbnailSizes)
        Collects the thumbnails the URLs of which are stored in the string array thumnailsURLs.
        Parameters:
        thumbnailURLs - the URLs of the thumbnails to be collected
        thumbnailSizes - the respective sizes of the thumbnails

    • Method Detail

      • adjustToHeight

        public void adjustToHeight(int edgeHeight)
        Resizes all thumbnail images so they have the height edgeHeight whilst keeping the aspect ratio.
        Parameters:
        edgeHeight - the height to which the thumbnails shall be resized.

      • adjustToRectangle

        public void adjustToRectangle(int edgeWidth,
                     int edgeHeight)
        Resizes the all thumbnails within the collection so that they fit in a rectangle of the size (edgeWidth, edgeHeight. The aspect ratio is preserved.
        Parameters:
        edgeWidth - the (maximum) with of the thumbnails
        edgeHeight - the (maximum) height of the thumbnails

      • get

        public Image get(int index)
        Get the thumbnail image with the index i
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the image to be collected
        Returns:
        the image corresponding to the given index

      • imageSize

        public int[] imageSize(int index)
        Returns the actual size of image img. This is the size after adjustSize has been called.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the image for which the size shall be determined
        Returns:
        the actual size of the image

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(Image img)
        Returns the index of the given thumbnail image. (Indices are stored as string representation in the "id" field of the thumbnail.)
        Returns:
        the index of the thumbnail

      • setHooverStyle

        public void setHooverStyle(java.lang.String style)

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number ot thumbnails within the collection.
        Returns:
        the number of thumbnails
